Key Match Events: The Pelicans lost to the Timberwolves 104-97 in their home back-to-back opener with Zion Williamson returning and scoring 22 points in 28 minutes. Dejounte Murray scored a team-high 29 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans will host the Portland Trail Blazers next. Zion Williamson's availability for the second game is pending the injury report. The Utah Jazz are the next team to watch in the Western Conference standings.
